Name: gitlab-ce
Overview: GitLab Community Edition docker image based on the Omnibus package.

configstoragepath.Name: Config Storage Path
configstoragepath.Description: This is where GitLab will store its configuration files (use cache drive).

applicationdatastoragepath.Name: Application Data Storage Path
applicationdatastoragepath.Description: This is where GitLab will store its application data (use cache drive).

logstoragepath.Name: Log Storage Path
logstoragepath.Description: This is where GitLab will store its logs.

webinterfaceport(http).Name: Web Interface Port (HTTP)
webinterfaceport(http).Description: This is GitLab's Web UI port you can access via a web browser.

webinterfaceport(https).Name: Web Interface Port (HTTPS)
webinterfaceport(https).Description: This is GitLab's Web UI SSL port you can access via a web browser.
